message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, tailored to your specific needs and interests, is worth $800,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $950,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure you receive the best possible value while also securing a fair return for the investment I've made into creating this product. I believe this offer strikes a balance that benefits both parties and I look forward to discussing this further with you.
